body:
Hello forum users!
(This is mainly aimed towards my clan and the unofficial tourney, so feel free to skip this post if desired :)
As the title suggests, I'm going to be gone for the next 10 days. I live in Illinois, so I am going to visit Florida with my family! :D
Not sure where I'm going in Florida, I always let my family decide everything #LazyCrocIsLazy

Because of this, I won't be able to play in scrimmages or in tournament matches, which sucks I guess. I'll be able to play Minecraft a little bit on my laptop however, so expect to see me on a bit. Don't expect me to be very good though :P #LaggyLaptopIsLaggy

I probably won't be on the forums much as well. The whole summer I've basically been staring at a screen so I need to get time with my family and out in a scary place known as... the outdoors. *shudders*

That's basically it.
Goodbye!
And good luck teams, play some great games in the tourney! :D

title: Vacation! c:
